title: [Large-Scale] Understanding the Interaction Between Consumer Emotional Expression and Self-Construction

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Fundamental Consumer Behavior Theories and Psychological Concepts
context.additional_context: Enhancing the analytical competency of current language professionals in understanding the relationship between consumer emotional expression and cultural self-awareness.

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish between self-construal types (independent/interdependent) with 80% accuracy based on the intensity of emotions expressed by consumers.
Learners can write a report interpreting consumer decision-making patterns through emotional expression analysis.
Learners can propose emotion-self-construal linkage strategies from a linguistic perspective based on real-world case studies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
